abstract: The latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
snippet: The latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
lead_paragraph: Critics from The New York Times will be squashed into many of the city's clubs during the CMJ Music Marathon alongside other music fans and chroniclers. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we've invited readers to join us in appraising CMJ shows on Twitter.

headline.main: CMJ Day 2: Reader Reviews of Zola Jesus, Fidlar, We Are Augustines and More
